keyword: how many calories in a chicken quesadilla
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Quesadilla?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a chicken quesadilla, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, carbs, fat, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Quesadilla?
assumptions: 8-inch flour tortilla, 100g grilled chicken breast, 50g cheddar cheese, onions/peppers, cooked with 1 tsp oil; no sour cream or salsa.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, portion size, cheese type, cooking method, and added toppings. Check restaurant info or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard chicken quesadilla has about 550 kcal and 35 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken quesadilla from a restaurant?
faqs.a: Typically 500-700 kcal; homemade versions like this are around 550 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: About 35 g from the chicken and cheese.

faqs.q: Are chicken quesadillas high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1200 mg due to cheese and tortilla seasoning.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Use low-fat cheese, whole wheat tortilla, and skip added oil for ~400 kcal.

faqs.q: Does the tortilla type affect calories in a chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Flour tortillas add ~200 kcal; corn or low-carb options reduce it by 50-100 kcal.
